result.execSummary:
The defendant Christy R. Merrill was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Christy R. Merrill is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Christy R. Merrill was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to the Clerk of Courts Office. Fine/cost to be added to existing payment plan. Failure to pay will be warrant.

Not to have contact with: Charity Rogers. 
Not to possess or consume alcohol.

Must maintain treatment regimen until provider(s) cease program. 
No AODA assessment is required.

timeConds.notes: banked to be used by agent if necessary.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christy R. Merrill

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: from DOC to Judge GaleWyrick requesting use of banked jail time - GRANTED 3/9/16
from DOC to Judge GaleWyrick requesting clarification on JOC

CASES: 14CM360, 15CM27 Defendant Christy R. Merrill in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   KJB- Clerk. 11:22AM State- motion to enter JOC is withdrawn in 14CM360- moves to dismiss DJOC. 

15CM27 Ct 1- Def plea of NC, CT accepts plea, finds G, enters JOC. Ct 2 dismissed outright.  SENTENCING: w/h sent- 2 yr prob- appear by noon on 5/4/15, no alcohol, maintain treatment regimen until provider ceases program, 45 days banked jail to be used by agent if necessary, no AODA necessary, $265.60 fine/cost- to be added to existing PP, no contact w/ Charity Rogers. 

14CM360- state dismisses charge. 11:34am adj.

Defendant Christy R. Merrill in court with attorney Daniel E. Firkus.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KK Clerk 11:22AM CASES: 15CM27 and 14CM360.  Motion to enter JOC in 14CM360.  Atty Firkus advises of status.  Atty Smestad is Atty of record.  Court - Bond continues.  adj.  11:28AM   Final pre-trial scheduled for May 1, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Not to have contact with: Charity Rogers.   Not to possess or consume alcohol.  Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.  Must appear at all future court appearances.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 48 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.   Not to commit any new crimes.

CASES: 15CM27, 14CM360 Defendant Christy R. Merrill in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 2:57PM  14CM360 to track. Def- pleas of NG. WST. bond cont. 3:00pm adj.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 10, 2015 at 10:00 am.
